Have been using loves for years, never any issues. Today, I walk in to get a shower and get told they can't accept my card because it's a scanned photo on my phone. Mind you, I've been using my card this way for years, and my entire life is ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ shower, this place far exceeded that golden standard. I ‚Ä¶

Ok so I was looking and calling around Enid, OK for a truck stop for a place to take a nice hot shower, well if you are ever doing any traveling and you are close to Enid OK and you would a nice hot shower go to loves on Randolph. The staff ‚Ä¶

New facility, clean, looks well stocked. Shower room was large, decent hot water and pressure. No shelves in the shower for your stuff. Do give you 2 towels, that's a plus. Carl's Jr was okay, burger an onion rings were just warm, not hot. ‚Ä¶

The store and the restrooms were very clean. Where my issues comes In is I was put in a shower with my 4 year old and the employees and apparently loves knew that the light doesn't stay on longer then 2 minutes at a time so on top of not ‚Ä¶

Buying beware here. I purchased $550.00 in fuel and when I tried to get a shower, I was informed I needed to pay another $12.00 because I didn't have a love card to use. At other truck stops your fuel receipt is your proof for a shower. Aft ‚Ä¶

Nice and clean shower. Friendly staff. I walked in the polit across the street and left to come over here. very smart decision. They have a Hardee's restaurant. The parking lot probably handles 60 trucks. Seems to be a newer location. No ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice place cheap fuel ! Not busy at all ! Clean bathrooms ! Shower were hot and lot of pressure! Small showers but very clean ! Dated but super clean super sweet staff ! Lots of choices!!!
Its okay. Good if you have a dog. Toilets need more cleaning. There is  shower and laundry service available.

Great truck stop usually  however come to find out if you purchase $495.25 in deseil fuel and expect to get a shower for free without a amnesty card you're wrong. So I wanted my fuel purchase on this place and went be able to shower. ‚Ä¶
Thanks. Professional.  Polite. Clean restroom. Clean shower with plenty of hot water. Well stocked store. All very much appreciated.
Stopped thru there to take a shower and was very impressed with how clean the showers were,very happy with the results.
This is my "go to" spot whenever i drive through this area. Fuel, Shower & Food üëçüèΩ ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ hours. She explained they had spoken less than 45 min ago. His response was ‚Äúyou probably took a shower and got confused‚Äù whatever that means. I usually make it a point to go to Pilot/Flying J as I‚Äôve always had quality service. This one ‚Ä¶

The parking is always bad here because it's probably one of the only few truck stops in this city. However the shower and toilet in the shower room makes up for it. Nice water pressure, decent sized shower room and fat friendly toilet.

Came for a shower it was clean thank god! Bad part is I‚Äôm sweating the entire time I‚Äôm getting dressed. It‚Äôs no ac inside the bathroom with the showers just a FAN! THAT ISN‚ÄôT ENOUGH please fix this problem. I paid almost $20 to be back ‚Ä¶

CLEANEST SHOWER I HAVE SEEN IN MONTHS! There wasn't even a spec of dust in the fan!  ATTENTION WEARY TRAVELERS!! Forget your misconceptions of "truck stops" and don't "settle" for a rest area. (Not in a semi? You are allowed to park ‚Ä¶

No hot water yet again. Who the hell wants to take shower in this freezing water when it‚Äôs in the 40‚Äôs outside with the air conditioning on. Y‚Äôall are nuts. This is why people get sick. Fix your hot water if not keeps the showers closed

‚Ä¶ a keeper. Wonderful warm sincere greeting.  Took my shower grabbed a salad and she was busy with paperwork but asked if she could help me and rang me up‚Ä¶again with that sincere smile.  She is professional and efficient. I will make ‚Ä¶

90% of the truck parking is paid. There was 0 unpaid spots available at 1pm on a Thursday and a 1 hour wait for a shower. Used to come here years ago and it was halfway decent. Now it‚Äôs an overused garbage dump that aims to extort drivers ‚Ä¶

Shower is clean‚Ä¶

is not bad..

Normal PFJ with a dennys. Nice people here on a Saturday the shower guy was running his Azz off trying to get as many in and out as he could. But he needs to be a bit more observant as you see in the picture other then that all is nice. Bob ‚Ä¶
